title: Motivation Up!
detail_text: <:th_ch0007/>Kana-chan, can I pack the sandwich into this bento box?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Yeah! Maaan~, you really helped me out, Nozomi-chan~, thank you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>You’re going to take me to Haruka-chan’s live, so it’s only natural.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I’m looking forward to her live.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Fufufu~♪ It’s the angel - Haruka-chan’s live, after all♪ So it’s going to be the best live ever~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>That’s why we’re putting so much effort into making refreshments for her, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Of course! Onee-chan wants to support her with food so Haruka-chan can give out her best performance....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Fufu, I’m so jealous of Haruka-chan. She has such a delicious bento waiting for her every live.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Then, Kanata will bring refreshments for everyone at the next μ’s live. And as thanks for helping me today, Kanata will pack in a side dish of your choice, Nozomi-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Really!? Uwaaah, of my choice, huh.... Everything you make is delicious, so I don’t know what to pick, Kana-chan~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
